valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Tue 4 Nov 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Wed 5 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Low Bailey 972 losing its identity. New low expected FitzRoy 991 by 0600 tomorrow
